item.title: Content Creation
item.description: Java Selenium Automation Course Goals Java Selenium Automation Course Goals Clarify your student’s ending point. This will help you identify the skills youâ€™d like to help people acquire. what skills do your students need to learn to reach their goal? what will be different about your students after they take your course? Goals should be realistic and measurable, meaning students should be able to demonstrate their skill.

item.title: Python Kids
item.description: Description What You Will Learn Table of Contents YouTube Channel Prerequisite Other Details Description Learn Python the Fun and Easy Way Teach yourself (and your kids) to code fun games, graphics and GUI in Python, the powerful programming language used at tech companies and in academia. This course introduces you to this computer language by drawing shapes, coding a simple game, and designing GUIs (Graphic User Interfaces). Python GUI Programming
